metadata.description: In the world of Half Past Danger, suddenly the time is two minutes ‘til midnight: the Nazis have created a bioweapon that could be the end of everything, and all that stands in their way are a hard-drinking Irishman, a British femme fatale, a Japanese ninja with a pet dinosaur, and an American Marine who's literally bulletproof. It's an alternate-history, pulp science fiction-inspired, over-the-top, two-fisted thriller that finds a world on the brink!
metadata.name: Half Past Danger II: Dead To Reichs
